value:
La, la, la! The town's all snowy! La, la,
la! The snow's bright and white!
It's festival time!

So...so pretty! There's no snow
where I come from, so I'm having
a lot of fun here!

They said that if I'm good, I'll get a
present. You be good too!

There's SO much good food here! I'll
get you some. Wait right here! I'll be
back in a second.

I'm doing my very, very, very, VERY
best for the winter festival!

Guess what! Right now, there's a
winter festival going on over at
$Nf's castle!

Everybody is so happy... I'm happy
too!
Let's have another festival, OK?
So chilly! Oh...

What a nice gift! I'll remember this
for a long time!

Can I join in the festival? I've been
very good, so give me a LOT of
presents!

Hey, guess what! I got A LOT of
presents from SO MANY people!$k$pToys, books, shiny stones...all kinds
of stuff!$k$pBut you know what? What I like the
best is seeing how happy everybody
is.$k$pWhen everybody's smiling, it makes
me smile too. I just feel so...so warm
inside!$k$pYou know, winter isn't cold—it's
warm! Oooh, is it too early to start
planning for next year's festival?
たー！
それー！
きゃああっ！
えーん…
So sparkly!
Kaboom!
Go, go, go!
Stompy stompy!
I'm so cold...
*giggle*
Did you hear?! Did you, did you?! It's time for the winter festival!
That means I'm doing a good job, right?
Festival time, yaaaaay!
Do you know what a festival is? You get all of your friends together and go, and you all shout, "Yay! Hurray! Yippee!"
Lots of snow means lots of fun!
Do you think I'll get any presents? Hmm... I hope I do...
I can hug myself, but it's much warmer to hug someone else! Now get over here!
Yay!
Festivals are the bestivals!
I'll go...here!
